FAQ

How accurate is TurboScribe Pro?

TurboScribe Pro offers industry-leading 99% accuracy for clear audio. Our AI technology continuously improves to handle various accents, technical terminology, and challenging audio conditions.

What file formats can I upload?

We support all common audio and video formats including MP3, WAV, MP4, MOV, WMA, AVI, and more.

How long does transcription take?

Most files are transcribed in minutes. Processing time depends on file length, quality, and current system load. Pro users receive priority processing.
